message:
If you are using #VirtualBox with Windows 8.1, beware of this freeze issue on sleep & its workaround

http://gurustop.net/blog/2013/09/11/windows-8-1-sleep-stand-by-hang-freeze-unable-to-wake-up-virtualbox-bridge/
name: (Solution) Windows 8.1 hangs on sleep/standby, can’t wake up « GuruStop.NET (@Meligy)
caption: gurustop.net
description: When you send your physical computer running Windows 8.1 to sleep (stand-by), the computer screen goes black but all other power lights remain on, and you cannot wake it up by pressing any key or whatever, you have to hard reset it by pressing the power button till it stops.

data.message: انا عندي المشكلة دي، شكرا يا محمد على الحل
